title: Schedules and exhibits
context: [ยง431:4-235] Schedules and exhibits. Reporting of the information required in schedule A under section 431:4-232 and in schedule B under section 431:4-233, and the exhibit entitled &ldquo;stockholders information supplement-financial reporting to stockholder&rdquo; shall be made on forms or in a format approved by the commissioner. [L 2000, c 24, pt of ยง2]
